article_title: Revisiting Oral Arguments In The King v. Burwell Obamacare Supreme Court Case

article_metadata.author: Katherine Restrepo

og.description: The clock is ticking for the Supreme Court to rule on King v Burwell. At issue is whether the plain text of the Affordable Care Act limits health insurance subsidies to individual market policyholders in states that have created their own exchanges. If so, the IRS will be another headache [...]
